sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A brief apologie of Thomas Cartwright against all such slaunderous accusations as it pleaseth Mr Sutcliffe in seuerall pamphlettes most iniuriously to loade him with Cartwright, Thomas, 1535-1603. Throckmorton, Job, 1545-1601.
[28] p.
R. Schilders], [Middelburg : 1596.
Place of publication and printer's name from STC. Edited by Job Throckmorton --STC. One of a series of pamphlets issued in the controversy between Sutclife, Cartwright and Throckmorton. This is a response to: Matthew Sutcliffe. An answere unto a certaine calumnious letter published by M. Job Throkmorton, and entituled, A defence of J. Throkmorton against the slaunders of M. Sutcliffe. Signatures: A-C⁴ D² . Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
